sense.gloss: to drink, to gulp, to swallow, to take (medicine)
to make light of, to conceal
to understand, to grasp, to take in, to catch on, to learn
to be filled with (people), to contain
to swallow (one's words), to suppress (a yawn, tears, etc.), to stifle, to hold back
carefree, optimistic, careless, reckless, heedless, happy-go-lucky, easygoing, thoughtless
bar, saloon, pub, tavern, drinking establishment
swallowing (e.g. a story), accepting without questioning
wantan, wanton, won ton, wonton (Chinese dumpling), wuntun
swallowing in one gulp, downing, mouthful, bite
thinking nothing of one's opponent, making easy prey of someone
taste (of a liquid, esp. alcoholic beverages)
place one's lips touch on the rim of a cup
shape of one's mouth when drinking
swallowing (a story), believing unquestioningly, accepting blindly, accepting without fully understanding, memorizing without understanding
accepting (a proposal, demand, etc.) unconditionally, accepting as-is
to hold one's breath (in fear, anxiety, etc.)
fish large enough to swallow a whole boat, colossal fish
suckling child, babe in arms, child at the breast, baby, infant
trader performing (stock market) bucketing, bucket shop

r_ele.r: みずのみびゃくしょう

sense.gloss: to be broad-minded enough to associate with various types of people, to possess a capacious mind

sdata.j: カール・ランジの↑記録↑↓きろく↓↑破↑↓やぶ↓りの↑幅跳↑↓はばと↓びに、↑観衆↑↓かんしゅう↓は↑息↑↓いき↓を↑呑↑↓の↓んだ。
sdata.e: Karl Lange's record breaking long jump took the crowd's breath away.

sdata.j: ↑夫↑↓おっと↓の↑勃起↑↓ぼっき↓↑不全↑↓ふぜん↓はお↑酒↑↓さけ↓を↑呑↑↓の↓むようになったのが↑原因↑↓げんいん↓でしょうか？
sdata.e: Is the source of the erectile dysfunction of my husband the fact that he started drinking?

sdata.j: ネット↑上↑↓じょう↓の↑不↑↓ふ↓↑確実↑↓かくじつ↓な↑情報↑↓じょうほう↓を↑鵜呑↑↓うの↓みにしてはならない。
sdata.e: You mustn't swallow unreliable information that's on the Web.

sdata.j: 50↑歳↑↓さい↓になっても、きっとまだ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑息↑↓いき↓を↑呑↑↓の↓むほど↑美↑↓うつく↓しいに↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: Even when she is 50 years old, she will still be breathtakingly beautiful.

sdata.j: 50↑歳↑↓さい↓になったとしても、まだ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑息↑↓いき↓を↑呑↑↓の↓むほど↑美↑↓うつく↓しかったことだろう。
sdata.e: Even if she got to be 50 years old, she would still be breathtakingly beautiful.

sdata.j: 50↑歳↑↓さい↓になっても、まだ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑息↑↓いき↓を↑呑↑↓の↓むほど↑美↑↓うつく↓しい。
sdata.e: Even at 50 years old, she's still breathtakingly beautiful.

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べて、↑呑↑↓の↓んで、↑楽↑↓たの↓しもう！
sdata.e: Let's eat, drink, and be merry.

sdata.j: トムは↑呑↑↓の↓み↑助↑↓すけ↓だ。
トムは↑呑気↑↓のんき↓でマイペースな↑性格↑↓せいかく↓だ。
sdata.e: Tom tends to do things at his own pace.

sdata.j: ↑全↑↓すべ↓てを↑鵜呑↑↓うの↓みにしない↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいと↑思↑↓おも↓うよ。
sdata.e: I think you should take it all with a pinch of salt.

sdata.j: どうして、↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑言葉↑↓ことば↓を↑鵜呑↑↓うの↓みにするの？
sdata.e: Why do you blindly accept what others say?

sdata.j: ↑噂↑↓うわさ↓↑話↑↓ばなし↓を↑鵜呑↑↓うの↓みにするんじゃない。
sdata.e: Don't take gossip at face value.

sdata.j: ヘビが↑卵↑↓たまご↓を↑丸呑↑↓まるの↓みしてるよ。
sdata.e: The snake is swallowing an egg.
